title: Values are our strength
text: With the help of drones, the brigade can detect enemy positions in advance and react as effectively as possible.
blockText1: We are on the path to creating an Independent Ukrainian Catholic State.
blockText2: We are warriors by vocation and our element is war. Act against fear and view the threat as a predator, not a victim.
blockText3: We are on the path to creating an Independent Ukrainian Catholic State.
